Title: The Spirit of Thunder Ridge
Description:
Life can only thrive when a delicate balance is maintained. The arrival of your people and the humans was but the first link in the chain that led to desolation.

You yourself are not to blame, but you can be the force that restores what once was.

Dive into the waters below and recover the seeds buried in the silt. They are a memory of the ancient forest that once grew in harmony with my people.

Beware, the elements are not at peace here.
ObjectivesText: Work with the Spirit of Thunder Ridge to restore life to the area.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Farseer Aggralan in Razor Hill
